page.title: 15A CHILD'S DAY (11 YRS OLD)
page.content: It's Monday, I go downstairs and wash. It is 8:15 and I get my sister up.I dress and eat breakfast.Next I get my school-bag ready.From 8:40 to 9:05 I read a book.{School}starts at 9:15.We usually do Maths. until 10:30.After playtime it's some kind of English until 12:15.The{Swimming}Bus comes at 1:05.Burghill children are picked up on the way, and the lesson at the School Baths in Hereford is from 1:30 to 2:00.I have passed my Gold Challenge Award.We return to school at about 2:40 and then listen to an astronomy programme on the radio.At 3:15 we put up our chairs and go home. I peel the potatoes for tea, then read or watch television.After tea at 6:00 sometimes my brother and I wash-up.Next I read or do other activities.From 7:00 until 9:00 it's television, then bed.ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ
